verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4003>fifteenth<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> of the <S%G2231>reign<s%> of <S%G5086>Tiberius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>, <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> being <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> being <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G2484>Ituraea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5139>Trachonitis<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3078>Lysanias<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G9>Abilene<s%>,

in <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G749>high-priesthood<s%> of <S%G452>Annas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%>, the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the region round <S%G4066>about<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>The<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, Make <S%G2090>ye<s%> ready the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4160>Make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight<s%>.

Every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5327>valley<s%> shall be <S%G4137>filled<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1015>hill<s%> shall be brought <S%G5013>low<s%>; <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G4646>crooked<s%> shall <S%G2071>become<s%> <S%G2117>straight<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5138>rough<s%> ways3598, 1519 <S%G3006>smooth<s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> the <S%G4992>salvation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

He <S%G3004><s%> said <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> that went <S%G1607>out<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Ye <S%G1081>offspring<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers<s%>, <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G5263>warned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>?

Bring <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3962>to<s%> our <S%G3962>father<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> to raise <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> unto <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> even <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G513>axe<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2749>lieth<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees<s%>: <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G4160>bringeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is hewn <S%G1581>down<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> must we <S%G4160>do<s%>?

And he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats<s%>, let him <S%G3330>impart<s%> to him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>none<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%>, let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%>.

And <S%G1161>there<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Teacher<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> must we <S%G4160>do<s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4238>Extort<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that which is <S%G1299>appointed<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4754>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4160>must<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>? <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, Extort <S%G1286>from<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> by <S%G3366>violence<s%>, neither <S%G4811>accuse<s%> any one <S%G4811>wrongfully<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G714>content<s%> <S%G3800>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3800>wages<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4328>expectation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%> <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G3379>whether<s%> haply <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1498>were<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G537>unto<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> there <S%G2064>cometh<s%> he that <S%G3450>is<s%> mightier <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G846>I<s%>, the <S%G2438>latchet<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> <S%G846>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>unloose<s%>: <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> in <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G4442>fire<s%>:

whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4425>fan<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, thoroughly to <S%G1245>cleanse<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G257>threshing-floor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G596>garner<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G892>chaff<s%> he will <S%G2618>burn<s%> up with <S%G762>unquenchable<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.
With <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G3870>exhortations<s%> therefore preached <S%G2097>he<s%> good <S%G2087>tidings<s%> unto the <S%G2992>people<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%>, being <S%G1651>reproved<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>'s <S%G5376><s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%>,
added <S%G4369><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>that<s%> he shut <S%G2623>up<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>, <S%G2424>that<s%>, Jesus <S%G2532>also<s%> having been <S%G907>baptized<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%>, the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> in a <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1491>form<s%>, <S%G5616>as<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%>, <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>; <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%>, when he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5616>teach<s%>, was about <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> of <S%G2094>age<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G5613>(as<s%> <S%G2242>was<s%> <S%G3543>supposed<s%>) of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>, the son of <S%G2242>Heli<s%>,
